-----

Numerical methods in pure Python.

In active development.

## Installation
```pip install numericals```

## Algorithms
- Integration
    - Trapezoidal Rule
    - Midpoint Rule
    - Simpson's Rule
    - Monte Carlo
    - Gaussian Quadrature

- ODE
    - Euler's Method
    - Heun's Method
    - Runge-Kutta 4

- Optimization
    - Golden Section Search

- Root-finding
    - Bisection Method
    - Secant Method
    - Newton's Method
    - Regula Falsi
    - Illinois Algorithm
